ReadingThe story this week is 'Living in Deserts' 

Please watch the video until you understand the story.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NxDlziHeNdg 

The spelling words for Next Thursday are:

shield
lack
exposure
nomadic
landscape
extreme
drowned
heatstroke
protect
conditions
traditional 
climate
oasis
barren
pollution 

I have assigned a story on What Lives in the Deserts? (DUE LAST FRIDAY)
I have assigned a story on 

Learning About the Sun ( DUE AFTER CHUSEOK)
Please try your best to complete these assignments to help your reading grow!  Please answer every question and SUBMIT.

 I have assigned a story on Readworks - Buying, Selling, and Trading

Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it

Please try your best to complete these assignments to help your reading grow!  Please answer every question and SUBMIT.

Science Museum Trip – Reminder

Tomorrow is our trip to the Gwacheon Science Museum! Please remember to:
Wear your MCA T-shirt
Bring a water bottle
Pack some snacks
Bring a small bag for your things
At the museum, you’ll find lots of hands-on exhibits you can touch, explore, and experiment with. There are halls about space, technology, nature, and even an outdoor area with cool displays. If the weather is nice, we’ll also spend some time in the playground before coming back to school.

It’s going to be a fun day of learning and discovery together!

Let's have a day of learning and bonding!
